description:
Lenessia is Serjiaddo`s Cowen granddaughter. Her dream is to spend whole day in bed, wearing comfortable pajamas and doing nothing. In time of Goblin King invasion, she shows prowess befitting a heiress of noble family, as (with a little help from Shiroe and Krusty) she manges to organize over 1200 adventurers to help defend Eastal.
Afterwards she is nominated as Eastal ambassador in Akihabara.
name: Lenessia Elarte Cowen
